product_name: Trico Sports Painkiller Saddle Pad - X-Large
long_description: This saddle pad allows you to add gel technology to your existing saddle for the ultimate in comfort. Memoflex(R) gel technology forms a fluid barrier between the rider and the hard shell of your seat to reduce shock and abrasion. Gel pads are fully enclosed, making them easy to put on and take off your saddle. Under-gel base is a tacky rubber to prevent slipping, and an extra-large drawstring closure provides a snug fit for a wide variety of saddles.
short_description: This saddle pad allows you to add gel technology to your existing saddle for the ultimate in comfort.
